First time attending an event. The location had two events which made it confusing as to which line was the right one. After clearing that up we went inside. We arrived a little after 11pm and were able to secure a table. At this point I had asked the server if there was a requirement to buy a bottle in order to stay seated. For other events, yes; it is typically a standard but not for the current event. After ordering 2 sets of beers which included 6 cans each. We were charged 2 different prices along with a list of different fees. There was a card fee, a mandatory 15% gratuity, tax, and there was something else. At the end we had to pay $109 for 2 sets (i paid with card, its a little less for cash). As the night progressed the price for the sets of beer increased again! This time time instead of the paying under $52 it was now close to $70. Its a pretty shady thing to do if you ask me. Been to plenty of bars and that isn't a thing, the later you order the more the price increases....this isn't the damn stock market üòí. The performances started at 2am and ended at 4am. I was expecting to be done by 2am. Which might have been something they didnt have control of. But I will say the sound quality did get worst at the end. I am sure other people could care less since many were drunk but nonetheless it wasn't good. The highlight of the night was the staff! They were actually very attentive, was very surprised. Staff hands down were great! Overall i did have a good time. Drinks kept coming for my group and i kept dancing, so the night was successful. For the future be mindful that arriving after 11pm is a gamble for securing a table and carrying cash is probably ideal, keeps you from paying that additional card fee.

Los meseros servian la comida y dejaban en cualquier parte de la mesa sin preguntar a quien correspondia cada plato. Cuando llegaron todas las trece personas, la solucion que ellos nos dieron fue sacar dos ni√±os de la mesa a otra mesa peque√±a. Es en serio?. Un pesimo servicio, nada cordiales, y la comida deja mucho que desear. Definitivamente, no lo recomiendo.

I came here for a birthday celebration.  It's not really the kind of Restaurant I go to, that being said, it's a nice place.  I like the decor of the place.  The space is big with a space to dance and a stage.  It has murals that are good to take photos at.  The food is mainly Ecuadorian.  The prices on the food are good.  They have a full bar.  I didn't drink so I don't know how the prices on drinks are.  After we sat down, we waited quite a long time before our order was taken.  However once we ordered, it didn't take long to get our food.  The place gives off a party atmosphere, which is fine but I wouldn't choose it for a casual lunch or to just go have a few drinks but that's just me.  Both those things can be done here.  If I were invited to another celebration or get together, I would attend.

I accept that this place satisfies me completely. I've tried many dishes here and loved them all. The menu features original culinary ideas. Staff was extremely efficient at clearing dishes and helping us. We viewed it as a standout experience.

First off, we had reservations and they said the place was full and had to go downstairs. We went downstairs and they said it was full too. One of the guys was nice enough to make us a table, that is the only reason why it‚Äôs even getting an extra star. The place was nice I guess, but the food was terrible. It lacked seasoning and the encebollado was pure liquid. The presentation was messy but I still gave it a try . I went with my friend and we both had an upset stomach later (food poisoning). The service was slow, I asked for a cup of water which for some reason they don‚Äôt have, and they only charge you for a bottle of water? I asked for an extra side, I finished my food and it still didn‚Äôt arrive. The food was overpriced for what you actually get. And also, don‚Äôt bother adding a tip because they automatically charge you for it. Glad I went so I know not to ever go again.

Vine a disfrutar un concierto, no pude comprar una entrada VIP por q ten√≠a que consumir alcohol y estoy en estado de embarazo, los de la mesa del frente m√≠o al verme cansada ya que desde las 9 pm estaba aqu√≠ y es la  1:40am a√∫n no sale el artista, me ofrecieron sentarme en su mesa, pero la mesera no lo permiti√≥, y ni siquiera pregunto al manager simplemente me neg√≥ sentarme siendo q los que pagaron por la mesa le pidieron que me dejara sentar ah√≠ un rato para descansar mis pies. Tuve q volver a sentarme en el piso, estando a solo 1 metro de distancia de la mesa. Me parece horrible q uno no pueda disfrutar de estos eventos por no consumir alcohol. En la foto est√° la mesera que no m e permiti√≥ sentarme y en la otra foto la distancia de la mesa.

I came to enjoy a concert, I couldn't buy a VIP ticket because I had to consume alcohol and I'm pregnant, those at the table in front of me saw me tired since I was here since 9 pm and it's still 1:40 am The artist doesn't come out, they offered me to sit at his table, but the waitress didn't help him, and I didn't even ask the manager, he simply refused me to sit down since those who paid for the table asked him to let me sit there for a while to rest my feet . I had to sit on the floor again, being only 1 meter away from the table. It seems horrible to me that one cannot enjoy these events because they do not consume alcohol. In the photo is the table that did not allow me to sit down and in the other photo the distance of the table.

I went to see a show with my girlfriend on Friday, July 14 at this restaurant. The atmosphere was great, however, in waiting we ordered a 'bandeja paisa' and a 'Hawaiian pi√±a colada' that comes in its own pineapple. The pi√±a colada was $25 and I was expecting something good but I could have made a better drink myself. Also it did not have a good alcohol to drink ratio, it had no alcohol at all.

We brought the tickets to the 'de que va' show online and they said it'd begin at 9pm. We show up at 9pm but the restaurant said the show begins at midnight. We did not want to wait 3 hours for a show. We figured we are here let's order drinks and food.

We ordered the food 'bandeja paisa' and despite it looking magnificent it lacked flavor in every department. On top of that the food made me throw up 30 minutes later and made my girlfriend feel sick. After telling the waiter I got sick from their food he said he'd look for the manager. He comes back a few minutes later and says the manager isn't there. We ended up leaving by 10:45pm for this terrible experience. We missed the show we had brought tickets for initially and we paid in full price for food that got me sick and a 25 dollar drink that was not very pleasing.

I used to come here alot and had good experiences before. After this terrible experience I will not be going back.

Great place very friendly staff seated very quickly drinks were very good food was amazing great atmosphere all the way around dishes are very nicely plated and presented highly recommend parking is a bit of an issue but overall great experience

Muy Mala experiencia. Te dicen y venden una cosa y despu√©s te dicen otra cosa y la excusa es que "todos los fines hay mal entendidos, los due√±os ni los gerentes est√°n disponibles para hablar... y para colmo te dicen "de que te quejas?" No recomendable! Muy Mala atenci√≥n!

No era nuestro primer evento hemos asistidos a varios y siempre sal√≠amos satisfechos pero esta vez del vallenato tal vez por que poco llenaron hicieron esto y peor aun trajeron un artista totalmente diferente, no recomiendo un pr√≥ximo evento han bajando su calidad en los eventos, lastima por que eran buenos

Olvidaron servir todo lo que pedimos, el men√∫ muy limitado y la atenci√≥n p√©sima, honestamente me doli√≥ dejar 60 d√≥lares en tips, si no me lo hubiesen incluido en la factura final ni loco les dejo esa cantidad, simplemente no se lo merecen. Pero como pr√°cticamente te obligan que le vamos hacer, para m√≠ mi una estafa, no les recomiendo este lugar a nadie, demasiado caro para lo que sirven, p√©simo servicio y la comida igual horrible‚Ä¶
